page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content:
Steven Cummings, St Thomas of Canterbury Junior School.
My name is Steven Cummings and I live at 6 Gilpin House Cheetham Estate Manchester 8. I am eleven years old. I live with my Mum and two sisters Susan and Tina. Susan is eighteen and Tina is eight. I am in Junior 4 and I am leaving school shortly and will be going to St. Joseph's High. I like football, I play for our school team. My favourite position is centre half back. I am deputy captain and this year our school won the Second Division of the Salford Schools League. We won all our games except one which we drew. Our school colours are red and white stripes. My favourite football team is Manchester United. I have been to eight football games and hve enjoyed all of them
